#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
	if(a==b)
	{return b;}
	if(a > b)
	{return gcd(a-b,b);}
	else
	{return gcd(a,b-a);}
}
int main()
{
	int k,l=0,t,a,b,c;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		l++;
		scanf("%d%d%d",&a,&b,&c);
		k=gcd(a,b);
		if(c%k==0)
		printf("Case %d: Yes\n",l);
		else
		printf("Case %d: No\n",l);
	}
}
